message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to significantly increase your [mention relevant benefit, e.g., profits, market share, efficiency]. While I can't disclose the exact details without a confidentiality agreement, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a limited-time offer, so let me know if you're interested and we can schedule a meeting to discuss the details.
